description.narrative: Integrated programme is designed to support to the implementation of devolved system of government to achieve improved governance and socio-economic development in Kenya.

participating-org.narrative: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: Phase I- Transition Project (2012-13) a. Capacity of the Transition Authority to facilitate effective transition to devolved governance (1-Limited capacity; 2-Partial capacity; 3-Full capacity) b. Percentage of devolved functions transferred to county governments Phase 2: Integrated Project (2014-2018) 1. Proportion of supported counties that have capacity to formulate laws that promote devolution 2. Number of supported counties with functional performance management systems 3. Number of supported counties that undertake evidence based decision making 4. Number of supported counties with strategies for peace building community security and cohesion integrated development plans and budgets, sectors strategies & programmes mainstreaming 5. Level of capacity of sub-national governments/administrations for planning, budgeting and monitoring basic services delivery.(1- No capacity; 2- very partial capacity; 3-partial capacity; 4-capacity largely in place)

comment.narrative: Phase I- Transition Project (2012-13) a. 1 (2012) b. 0% (2012) Phase 2: Integrated Project (2014-2018) 1. 0% (2013) 2. 0 (2013) 3. 0 (2013) 4. 0 (2013) 5. 1 -Planning; 1-Budgeting; 1 -M&E (2014)
